divs: Sighting DetailsIt appeared from nowhere very close to a constant bright star at the rear of property, at first vastly brighter than star which is why i think i noticed it out of the window in my living room but quickly faded away to nothing. It was star like in colour and glow but much brighter before it started to fade, it was over in about 15 to 20 seconds and the objet was moving at aeroplane speed in a diagonal line upward not down.
Summary: star like object travelling past a star and fading away quickly
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in wolverhampton
There were no other sightings in wolverhampton on or around September 1st 2011
